mapper.sql: ID, DEVICE_SN, DEVICE_NAME, STATUS, SURELY_UNIT, POSITION, TEMPERATURE, UPPER_TEMPERATURE, LOWER_TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, UPPER_HUMIDITY, LOWER_HUMIDITY, EMPTY_BOX_NUM, CARD_BOX_NUM, CARD_EMPTY_NUM, CARD_SAVE_NUM, CARD_ROW_COUNT, CARD_COLUMN_COUNT, BOOK_BOX_NUM, BOOK_EMPTY_NUM, BOOK_SAVE_NUM, BOOK_ROW_COUNT, BOOK_COLUMN_COUNT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into oms_cer_device_info (ID, DEVICE_SN, DEVICE_NAME, STATUS, SURELY_UNIT, POSITION, TEMPERATURE, UPPER_TEMPERATURE, LOWER_TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, UPPER_HUMIDITY, LOWER_HUMIDITY, EMPTY_BOX_NUM, CARD_BOX_NUM, CARD_EMPTY_NUM, CARD_SAVE_NUM, CARD_ROW_COUNT, CARD_COLUMN_COUNT, BOOK_BOX_NUM, BOOK_EMPTY_NUM, BOOK_SAVE_NUM, BOOK_ROW_COUNT, BOOK_COLUMN_COUNT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surelyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lowerTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lowerHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emptyBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardEmptyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardSaveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardRowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardColumnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookEmptyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookSaveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookRowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookColumnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update oms_cer_device_info
DEVICE_SN = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_NAME = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SURELY_UNIT = #{surelyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPERATURE = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPPER_TEMPERATURE = #{upperTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOWER_TEMPERATURE = #{lowerTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HUMIDITY = #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPPER_HUMIDITY = #{upperHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOWER_HUMIDITY = #{lowerHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPTY_BOX_NUM = #{emptyBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_BOX_NUM = #{cardBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_EMPTY_NUM = #{cardEmptyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_SAVE_NUM = #{cardSaveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_ROW_COUNT = #{cardRowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_COLUMN_COUNT = #{cardColumnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOK_BOX_NUM = #{bookBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOK_EMPTY_NUM = #{bookEmptyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOK_SAVE_NUM = #{bookSaveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOK_ROW_COUNT = #{bookRowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOK_COLUMN_COUNT = #{bookColumnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oms_cer_device_info set DEVICE_SN = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_NAME = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SURELY_UNIT = #{surelyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPERATURE = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPER_TEMPERATURE = #{upperTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOWER_TEMPERATURE = #{lowerTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HUMIDITY = #{humidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPER_HUMIDITY = #{upperHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOWER_HUMIDITY = #{lowerHumidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPTY_BOX_NUM = #{emptyBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_BOX_NUM = #{cardBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_EMPTY_NUM = #{cardEmptyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_SAVE_NUM = #{cardSaveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_ROW_COUNT = #{cardRowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_COLUMN_COUNT = #{cardColumnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BOOK_BOX_NUM = #{bookBoxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BOOK_EMPTY_NUM = #{bookEmptyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BOOK_SAVE_NUM = #{bookSaveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BOOK_ROW_COUNT = #{bookRowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BOOK_COLUMN_COUNT = #{bookColumnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT IF ( ( SELECT IF ( '0' = #{zjxs}, sum(book_empty_num),
IF ( '1' = #{zjxs}, sum(card_empty_num), 0 ) ) FROM oms_cer_device_info WHERE surely_unit = #{surelyUnit} AND STATUS = '1' ) > ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cf_certificate WHERE ( surely_way = '0' AND save_status = '1' AND card_status = '4' AND surely_unit = #{surelyUnit} AND zjxs = #{zjxs} ) OR ( surely_way = '0' AND save_status = '0' AND surely_unit = #{surelyUnit} AND zjxs = #{zjxs} ) ), 'true', 'false' ) FROM DUAL

SELECT IF ( ( SELECT org_id FROM cf_user WHERE IDNUMBER = #{idNo} AND user_name = #{name} AND user_state='1' ) = ( SELECT b.org_id FROM oms_cer_print_qr_code a INNER JOIN cf_user b ON a.operator = b.user_id WHERE a.qr_code_id = #{qrCodeId} LIMIT 1 ), 'true', 'false' ) FROM DUAL

SELECT b.id, c.name, c.zjlx, c.zjhm, c.csrq, c.yxqz, b.get_status getStatus FROM oms_cer_print_qr_code a INNER JOIN oms_cer_get_task b ON a.get_id = b.id INNER JOIN cf_certificate c ON b.cer_id = c.id WHERE a.qr_code_id = #{qrCodeId} AND b.get_status = '0'
SELECT user_id FROM cf_user WHERE IDNUMBER = #{idNo} AND user_name = #{name} AND user_state = '1'

SELECT b.id, a.busi_id busiId, b.name, b.zjlx, b.zjhm, b.cabinet_num cabinetNum, b.place, a.data_source dataSource FROM oms_cer_get_task a INNER JOIN cf_certificate b ON a.cer_id = b.id WHERE a.id=#{id}

if.if: SELECT zjhm, csrq, yxqz FROM cf_certificate WHERE save_status = '1' AND card_status IN ('4', '6', '41')
SELECT zjhm, csrq, yxqz FROM cf_certificate WHERE save_status = '1' AND card_status IN ('4', '6', '41') AND zjlx = 4
SELECT b.zjhm, b.csrq, b.yxqz FROM oms_cer_get_task a INNER JOIN cf_certificate b ON a.cer_id = b.id WHERE a.rf_b0000 = #{orgId} AND a.get_status = '1' AND a.data_source NOT IN ('1', '3', '4', '5')

mapper.select: SELECT id, name, zjhm, zjlx, oms_id omsId, (select surely_Unit from oms_cer_device_info where device_sn=#{deviceSn}) surelyUnit FROM cf_certificate WHERE zjhm =#{zjhm} AND zjlx=#{zjlx}
